author: djrtwo
content: There is some requisite system data for jumping into a shard from the beacon state. The actually shard's user-level state is currently assumed to not be required to process the shard blocks due to the planned shift to statelessnesss

author: 0xalizk
content: I can see the current validators of Shard B posting a commitment to the state changes they enacted during current epoch, and the beacon chain accepting that optimistically (similar to how an OptiRollup chain posts on ETH1.0) ... but then the new validators need the actual state before starting their shift .. I don't see how this requirement can be circumvented through statelessness because validators need _write_ access while lightclients only need _read_ access.

author: 0xalizk
